morningstar
‚òÖ Model DeepSeek R1 (Thinking) [deepseek]
‚òÖ Projekt my-app (TypeScript / Next.js)
‚òÖ Branch main
Tools read ¬∑ write ¬∑ edit ¬∑ bash ¬∑ grep ¬∑ glob ¬∑ ls ¬∑ git

Capabilities

Everything you need. Nothing you don't.

üåê

7 AI Providers

DeepSeek, OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Ollama, Groq, OpenRouter ‚Äî switch mid-session with /model

üõ†

9 Built-in Tools

read, write, edit, delete, bash, grep, glob, ls, git ‚Äî with undo support and colored diffs

‚ú®

VS Code Highlighting

Shiki-powered syntax highlighting with the vitesse-dark theme ‚Äî same engine as VS Code

ü§ñ

Custom Agents

6 built-in agents + create your own with custom system prompts, export & import as JSON

üîí

Permission System

Per-project permissions with allow/deny lists, 3 modes: auto, ask, strict ‚Äî like Claude Code

üß†

Memory & History

Persistent notes across sessions, todo system with priorities, save & restore conversations

üé®

Image Generation

Local Stable Diffusion (txt2img) ‚Äî generate images directly from your terminal

üëÅ

Vision Analysis

Analyze screenshots and images with LLaVA / multimodal models for UI reviews

üé≠

6 Themes

Default (gold), Ocean (blue), Hacker (green), Sunset (red), Nord (frost), Rose (pink)

Live Demo

Watch it think.

morningstar ‚Äî ~/my-app
Providers

7 Providers. Any Model.

DeepSeek
R1 Reasoner, Chat
--model deepseek-reasoner
OpenAI
o3, o4-mini, GPT-4.1, Codex
--model o3
Anthropic
Claude Opus 4, Sonnet 4
--model claude-opus-4-20250514
Google
Gemini 2.0 Flash / Pro
--model gemini-2.0-flash
Ollama
Any local model
--model llama3
Groq
LLaMA 3.3, Mixtral
--model llama-3.3-70b-versatile
OpenRouter
Any model via API
--model openrouter/auto
$ morningstar --model o3
‚òÖ Provider auto-detected: OpenAI
Tools

9 Tools. Full Control.

The AI chains tool calls automatically ‚Äî up to 5 rounds per message. Every file change is undoable.

readRead files with line numbers
writeCreate & overwrite files
editFind & replace with diffs
deleteDelete files (undoable)
bashExecute any command
grepSearch patterns in files
globFind files by pattern
lsList directory contents
gitStatus + commit history
‚úî [edit] src/app/page.tsx
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ - const data = fetchData()
‚îÇ + const data = await fetchData()
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò
Install

Get started in 30 seconds.

Requires Node.js 18+

terminal
$ git clone https://github.com/morningstarnasser/morningstar-cli.git
$ cd morningstar-cli
$ npm install && npm run build && npm link
$ morningstar
‚òÖ Welcome to Morningstar AI
Environment
export DEEPSEEK_API_KEY=sk-...
.env File
OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-proj-...
Interactive
First launch prompts you
